OpenGL Text-Renderer

View on GitHub

This OpenGL-based Text-Renderer uses a Font-sheet approach to dynamically shrink text to fit textboxes.

  • Highlights:
    • Dynamic word-wrapping
    • Highly customizable
    • Integration with multiple languages
